Feature.Name: HBVersion
Feature.Description::en: Version of High Bandwidth Mode.
Feature.Description::cn: 高带宽模式的版本

Feature.Name: HBAbnormalMonitor
Feature.Description::en: If the compression rate is abnormal, High Bandwidth AbnormalMonitor plus 1.
Feature.Description::cn: 如果压缩率异常，高带宽异常检测数加1

Feature.Name: TriggerCacheEnable
Feature.Description::en: Specifies whether or not the Trigger Cache is enabled.
Feature.Description::cn: 指定是否启用触发器缓存。

Feature.Name: LineDebouncerTimeNs
Feature.Description::en: Sets the value of the selected line debouncer time in ns.
Feature.Description::cn: 设置所选行去缓冲时间的值（ns）

Feature.Name: TransferControl
Feature.Description::en: Category for the Sequencer Control features.
Feature.Description::cn: 传输控制功能类

Feature.Name: TransferSelector
Feature.Description::en: Selects which stream transfers are currently controlled by the selected Transfer features.
Feature.Description::cn: 选择一个流传输器，当前的传输特性由这个流传输器所控制。

Feature.Name: TransferControlMode
Feature.Description::en: selects the control method for the transfers.
Feature.Description::cn: 选择传输的控制模式

Feature.Name: TransferOperationMode
Feature.Description::en: Selects the operation mode of the transfer.
Feature.Description::cn: 选择传输的操作模式

Feature.Name: TransferBlockCount
Feature.Description::en: Specifies the number of data Blocks that the device should stream before stopping. This feature is only active if the TransferOperationMode is set to MultiBlock.
Feature.Description::cn: 在设备停止取流之前指定数据块的个数，这个属性只有传输操作模式设置为多数据块时才会生效

Feature.Name: TransferQueueMaxBlockCount
Feature.Description::en: Controls the maximum number of data blocks that can be stored in the block queue of the selected stream.
Feature.DisplayName::cn: 传输队列最大的数据块个数
Feature.Description::cn: 控制在传输流队列中最大能存储的数据块个数。

Feature.Name: TransferQueueCurrentBlockCount
Feature.Description::en: Returns the number of Block(s) currently in the transfer queue.
Feature.DisplayName::cn: 当前传输对流数据块个数
Feature.Description::cn: 返回在当前传输队列中的数据块个数

Feature.Name: TransferQueueOverFlowCount
Feature.Description::en: Returns the number of Count(s) Over Flow in the transfer queue.
Feature.Description::cn: 返回传输队列的溢出个数

Feature.Name: TransferQueueMode
Feature.Description::en: Specifies the operation mode of the transfer queue.
Feature.Description::cn: 指定传输队列的操作模式

Feature.Name: TransferStart
Feature.Description::en: Starts the streaming of data blocks out of the device. This feature must be available when the TransferControlMode is set to "UserControled". If the TransferStart feature is not writable (locked), the application should not start the transfer and should avoid using the feature until it becomes writable again.
Feature.Description::cn: 设备开始数据块的传输。该属性是有传输控制模式设为用户控制时才生效。如果该属性只读状态，在它变为可编辑之前用户应该避免去操作它.

Feature.Name: TransferStop
Feature.Description::en: Stops the streaming of data Block(s). The current block transmission will be completed. This feature must be available when the TransferControlMode is set to "UserControlled.
Feature.Description::cn: 停止数据块的传输，当前数据块将被传输完成。该属性是有传输控制模式设为用户控制时才生效。

Feature.Name: TransferAbort
Feature.Description::en: Aborts the streaming of data Block(s). The current block transmission will be completed. This feature must be available when the TransferControlMode is set to "UserControlled.
Feature.Description::cn: 中止数据块的传输，当前数据块将被传输完成。该属性是有传输控制模式设为用户控制时才生效。

Feature.Name: TransferPause
Feature.Description::en: Pauses the streaming of data Block(s). Pausing the streaming will immediately suspend the ongoing data transfer even if a block is partially transfered. The device will resume its transmission at the reception of a TransferResume command.
Feature.Description::cn: 暂停数据块的传输，即使当前数据块只有部分已经传输也会立即停止数据的传输。该属性是有传输控制模式设为用户控制时才生效。

Feature.Name: TransferResume
Feature.Description::en: Resumes a data Blocks streaming that was previously paused by a TransferPause command.
Feature.Description::cn: 当数据块被传输暂停命令暂停传输，可以执行该命令重新开始传输

Feature.Name: ADCGainEnable
Feature.Description::en: Enable Analog Gain
Feature.Description::cn: 使能模拟增益

Feature.Name: ADCBitsDepth
Feature.Description::en: The depth of the ADC.
Feature.Description::cn: ADC的深度

Feature.Name: AcquisitionBurstFrameCount
Feature.Description::en: Number of frames to acquire for each FrameBurstStart trigger.
Feature.Description::cn: 每个帧突发开始触发信号采集的帧数

Feature.Name: AcquisitionControl
Feature.Description::en: Category for the acquisition and trigger control features.
Feature.Description::cn: 采集和触发控制功能类

Feature.Name: AcquisitionFrameCount
Feature.Description::en: Number of frames to acquire in multi-frame acquisition mode.
Feature.Description::cn: 多帧采集模式下每次采集帧数

Feature.Name: AcquisitionFrameRate
Feature.Description::en: Controls the acquisition rate at which the frames are captured.
Feature.Description::cn: 控制抓取帧的采集频率

Feature.Name: AcquisitionFrameRateEnable
Feature.Description::en: Enables manual control of the camera frame rate.
Feature.Description::cn: 使能手动控制相机的帧率

Feature.Name: AcquisitionLineRate
Feature.Description::en: Controls the acquisition rate at which the Lines are captured.
Feature.Description::cn: 控制抓取行的采集频率

Feature.Name: AcquisitionLineRateEnable
Feature.Description::en: Enables manual control of the camera Line rate.
Feature.Description::cn: 使能手动控制相机的行频

Feature.Name: AcquisitionMode
Feature.Description::en: Sets the acquisition mode of the device.
Feature.Description::cn: 设置设备的采集模式

Feature.Name: AcquisitionStart
Feature.Description::en: Starts the Acquisition of the device.
Feature.Description::cn: 开始设备采集

Feature.Name: AcquisitionStop
Feature.Description::en: Stops the acquisition of the device at the end of the current frame.
Feature.Description::cn: 当前帧结束后停止设备采集

Feature.Name: ActionControl
Feature.Description::en: Category that contains the Action control features.
Feature.Description::cn: 动作命令控制功能类

Feature.Name: ActionDeviceKey
Feature.Description::en: Provides the device key that allows the device to check the validity of action commands. The device internal assertion of an action signal is only authorized if the ActionDeviceKey and the action device key value in the protocol message are equal.
Feature.Description::cn: 提供允许设备检查动作命令有效性的设备密钥。只有当协议消息中的动作设备密匙值相等时，才授权操作动作信号的设备内部断言

Feature.Name: ActionGroupKey
Feature.Description::en: Provides the key that the device will use to validate the action on reception of the action protocol message.
Feature.Description::cn: 提供设备在接收动作命令协议消息时用于验证动作命令的密钥

Feature.Name: ActionGroupMask
Feature.Description::en: Provides the mask that the device will use to validate the action on reception of the action protocol message.
Feature.Description::cn: 提供设备在接收协议消息时用于验证动作命令的掩码

Feature.Name: ActionQueueSize
Feature.Description::en: Indicates the size of the scheduled action commands queue. This number represents the maximum number of scheduled action commands that can be pending at a given point in time.
Feature.Description::cn: 指示计划动作命令队列的大小。此数字表示可在给定时间点挂起的计划动作命令的最大数目

Feature.Name: ActionSelector
Feature.Description::en: Selects to which Action Signal further Action settings apply.
Feature.Description::cn: 选择应用于哪个动作信号进一步动作设置

Feature.Name: ActivateShading
Feature.Description::en: Activates the selected shading set.
Feature.Description::cn: 激活选中的阴影集

Feature.Name: AirspaceNoiseReduction
Feature.Description::en: Sets the Airspace noise reduction level.
Feature.Description::cn: 设置空域降噪级别

Feature.Name: AnalogControl
Feature.Description::en: Category that contains the Analog control features.
Feature.Description::cn: 模拟控制功能类

Feature.Name: AutoExposureTimeLowerLimit
Feature.Description::en: Lower limit of the Auto Exposure Time parameter
Feature.Description::cn: 自动曝光时间参数的下限

Feature.Name: AutoExposureTimeUpperLimit
Feature.Description::en: Upper limit of the Auto Exposure Time parameter
Feature.Description::cn: 自动曝光时间参数的上限

Feature.Name: AutoFunctionAOIHeight
Feature.Description::en: This value sets the height of the auto function area of interest in pixels.
Feature.Description::cn: 此值设置自动功能感兴趣区域的高度（以像素为单位）

Feature.Name: AutoFunctionAOIOffsetX
Feature.Description::en: This value sets the starting column of the auto function area of interest in pixels.
Feature.Description::cn: 此值设置自动功能感兴趣区域的起始列（以像素为单位）

Feature.Name: AutoFunctionAOIOffsetY
Feature.Description::en: This value sets the starting line of the auto function area of interest in pixels.
Feature.Description::cn: 此值设置自动功能感兴趣区域的起始行（以像素为单位）

Feature.Name: AutoFunctionAOISelector
Feature.Description::en: Selects the Auto Function AOI.
Feature.Description::cn: 选择自动功能AOI

Feature.Name: AutoFunctionAOIUsageRedLightCorrection
Feature.DisplayName::en: Auto Function AOI Usage Red Light Correction
Feature.DisplayName::cn: 自动功能AOI使用红光矫正

Feature.Name: AutoFunctionAOIUsageWhiteBalance
Feature.DisplayName::en: Auto Function AOI Usage White Balance

Feature.Name: AutoFunctionAOIWidth
Feature.Description::en: This value sets the width of the auto function area of interest in pixels.
Feature.Description::cn: 此值设置自动功能感兴趣区域的宽度（以像素为单位）

Feature.Name: AutoGainLowerLimit
Feature.Description::en: Lower limit of the Auto Gain parameter
Feature.Description::cn: 自动增益参数的下限

Feature.Name: AutoGainUpperLimit
Feature.Description::en: Upper limit of the Auto Gain parameter
Feature.Description::cn: 自动增益参数的上限

Feature.Name: BalanceColorTemperatureMode
Feature.Description::en: Control the color temperature mode under auto balance mode.
Feature.Description::cn: 在自动平衡模式下控制色温模式

Feature.Name: BalanceRatio
Feature.Description::en: This value sets the selected balance ratio control as an integer.
Feature.Description::cn: 此值设置所选的平衡比控制（作为整数）

Feature.Name: BalanceRatioSelector
Feature.Description::en: Selects a balance ratio to configure. Once a balance ratio control has been selected.
Feature.Description::cn: 选择平衡比控制后，选择要配置的平衡比

Feature.Name: BalanceWhiteAuto
Feature.Description::en: Balance White Auto is the 'automatic' counterpart of the manual white balance feature.
Feature.Description::cn: 自动白平衡是对应手动白平衡的“自动”功能

Feature.Name: BinningHorizontal
Feature.Description::en: Number of Horizontal pixels to combine together.
Feature.Description::cn: 要合并在一起的水平像素数

Feature.Name: BinningSelector
Feature.Description::en: Selects which binning engine is controlled by the BinningHorizontal and BinningVertical features.
Feature.Description::cn: 选择由水平合并和垂直合并功能控制的合并引擎

Feature.Name: BinningVertical
Feature.Description::en: Number of vertical pixels to combine together.
Feature.Description::cn: 要合并在一起的垂直像素数

Feature.Name: BlackLevel
Feature.Description::en: Analog black level in percent.
Feature.Description::cn: 模拟黑电平百分比

Feature.Name: BlackLevelAuto
Feature.Description::en: Controls the mode for automatic black level adjustment. The exact algorithm used to implement this adjustment is device-specific.
Feature.Description::cn: 控制自动黑电平调节的模式，用于实现此调节的精确算法是特定于设备的

Feature.Name: BlackLevelEnable
Feature.Description::en: Enables/disables black level adjustment.
Feature.Description::cn: 使能/禁用黑电平调整

Feature.Name: Brightness
Feature.Description::en: This value sets the selected Brightness control
Feature.Description::cn: 此值设置选定的亮度控制

Feature.Name: ChannelCorrectMode
Feature.Description::en: Select Channel Correct Mode
Feature.Description::cn: 选择通道矫正模式

Feature.Name: ChunkBrightnessInfo
Feature.Description::en: the brightness used to capture the image.
Feature.Description::cn: 用于捕获图像的亮度

Feature.Name: ChunkDataControl
Feature.Description::en: Category that contains the Chunk Data control features.
Feature.Description::cn: 数据块控制功能类

Feature.Name: ChunkEnable
Feature.Description::en: This boolean value enables the inclusion of the selected chunk in the payload data.
Feature.Description::cn: 此布尔值使能在有效负载数据中包含选定的数据块

Feature.Name: ChunkExposure
Feature.Description::en: the exposure time used to capture the image.
Feature.Description::cn: 用于捕获图像的曝光时间

Feature.Name: ChunkExtTriggerCount
Feature.Description::en: the counter of extern trigger.
Feature.Description::cn: 外部触发器的计数器

Feature.Name: ChunkFrameCounter
Feature.Description::en: the counter of the Frame.
Feature.Description::cn: 帧计数器

Feature.Name: ChunkGain
Feature.Description::en: the gain used to capture the image.
Feature.Description::cn: 用于捕获图像的增益

Feature.Name: ChunkHeight
Feature.Description::en: the entire height data included in the payload.
Feature.Description::cn: 有效负载中包含的完整高度数据

Feature.Name: ChunkImage
Feature.Description::en: the entire image data included in the payload.
Feature.Description::cn: 有效负载中包含的完整图像数据

Feature.Name: ChunkLineInputOutput
Feature.Description::en: the status of I/O
Feature.Description::cn: I/O状态

Feature.Name: ChunkModeActive
Feature.Description::en: Activates the inclusion of Chunk data in the payload of the image.
Feature.Description::cn: 激活在图像的有效负载中包含数据块

Feature.Name: ChunkOffsetX
Feature.Description::en: the entire offsetX data included in the payload.
Feature.Description::cn: 有效负载中包含的完整水平偏移数据

Feature.Name: ChunkOffsetY
Feature.Description::en: the entire offsetY data included in the payload.
Feature.Description::cn: 有效负载中包含的完整垂直偏移数据

Feature.Name: ChunkPixelFormat
Feature.Description::en: the entire pixel format data included in the payload.
Feature.Description::cn: 有效负载中包含的完整像素格式数据

Feature.Name: ChunkROIPosition
Feature.Description::en: the status of ROI Position.
Feature.Description::cn: 感兴趣区域的位置状态

Feature.Name: ChunkSelector
Feature.Description::en: Selects which Chunk to enable or control.
Feature.Description::cn: 选择要使能或控制的数据块

Feature.Name: ChunkTimestamp
Feature.Description::en: the Timestamp of the image included in the payload at the time of the FrameStart internal event.
Feature.Description::cn: 在帧开始内部事件发生时包含在有效负载中的图像的时间戳

Feature.Name: ChunkWhiteBalance
Feature.Description::en: the value of white balance.
Feature.Description::cn: 白平衡值

Feature.Name: ChunkWidth
Feature.Description::en: the entire width data included in the payload.
Feature.Description::cn: 有效负载中包含的完整宽度数据

Feature.Name: ColorTransformationControl
Feature.Description::en: Category that contains the Color Transformation control features.
Feature.Description::cn: 颜色转换控制功能类

Feature.Name: ColorTransformationEnable
Feature.Description::en: Activates the selected Color Transformation module.
Feature.Description::cn: 激活选定的颜色转换模块

Feature.Name: ColorTransformationSelector
Feature.Description::en: Selects which Color Transformation module is controlled by the various Color Transformation features.
Feature.Description::cn: 选择由各种颜色转换功能控制的颜色转换模块

Feature.Name: ColorTransformationValue
Feature.Description::en: Represents the value of the selected Gain factor or Offset inside the Transformation matrix.
Feature.Description::cn: 表示变换矩阵内选定增益因子或偏移量的值

Feature.Name: ColorTransformationValueSelector
Feature.Description::en: Selects the Gain factor or Offset of the Transformation matrix to access in the selected Color Transformation module.
Feature.Description::cn: 选择要在所选颜色转换模块中访问的转换矩阵的增益因子或偏移量

Feature.Name: CounterAndTimerControl
Feature.Description::en: Category that contains the Counter and Timer control features.
Feature.Description::cn: 计数器和定时器控制功能类

Feature.Name: CounterCurrentValue
Feature.Description::en: Reads the value of the selected Counter.
Feature.Description::cn: 读取所选计数器的值

Feature.Name: CounterEventSource
Feature.Description::en: Select the events that will be the source to increment the Counter.
Feature.Description::cn: 选择将作为递增计数器源的事件

Feature.Name: CounterReset
Feature.Description::en: Does a software reset of the selected Counter and starts it. The counter starts counting events immediately after the reset unless a Counter trigger is active. CounterReset can be used to reset the Counter independently from the CounterResetSource. To disable the counter temporarily, set CounterEventSource to Off.
Feature.Description::cn: 对所选计数器进行软件重置并启动它。计数器在重置后立即开始计数事件，除非计数器触发器处于活动状态。计数器复位可用于独立于计数器复位源外重置计数器。若要暂时禁用计数器，请将计数器事件源设置为“关闭”

Feature.Name: CounterResetSource
Feature.Description::en: Selects the signals that will be the source to reset the Counter.
Feature.Description::cn: 选择将作为计数器复位源的信号

Feature.Name: CounterSelector
Feature.Description::en: Selects which Counter to configure.
Feature.Description::cn: 选择设定的计数器

Feature.Name: CounterValue
Feature.Description::en: Reads or writes the current value of the selected Counter.
Feature.Description::cn: 读取或写入所选计数器的当前值

Feature.Name: CounterValueAtReset
Feature.Description::en: Reads the value of the selected Counter when it was reset by a trigger or by an explicit CounterReset command.
Feature.Description::cn: 当被触发器或直接的计数器复位命令重置时，读取所选计数器的值

Feature.Name: DecimationHorizontal
Feature.Description::en: Horizontal sub-sampling of the image.
Feature.Description::cn: 图像的水平下采样

Feature.Name: DecimationVertical
Feature.Description::en: Vertical sub-sampling of the image.
Feature.Description::cn: 图像的垂直下采样

Feature.Name: Deinterlacing
Feature.Description::en: Controls how the device performs de-interlacing.
Feature.Description::cn: 控制设备执行去隔行扫描的方式

Feature.Name: DeviceCharacterSet
Feature.Description::en: Character set used by the strings of the device`s bootstrap registers.
Feature.Description::cn: 设备引导寄存器字符串使用的字符集

Feature.Name: DeviceConnectionSelector
Feature.Description::en: Selects which Connection of the device to control.
Feature.Description::cn: 选择要控制的设备连接

Feature.Name: DeviceConnectionSpeed
Feature.Description::en: Indicates the speed of transmission of the specified Connection
Feature.Description::cn: 表示指定连接的传输速度

Feature.Name: DeviceConnectionStatus
Feature.Description::en: Indicates the status of the specified Connection.
Feature.Description::cn: 指示指定连接的状态

Feature.Name: DeviceControl
Feature.Description::en: Category for device information and control.
Feature.Description::cn: 设备信息和控制类

Feature.Name: DeviceEventChannelCount
Feature.Description::en: Indicates the number of event channels supported by the device.
Feature.Description::cn: 指示设备支持的事件通道数

Feature.Name: DeviceFirmwareVersion
Feature.Description::en: Version of the firmware in the device.
Feature.Description::cn: 设备中固件的版本

Feature.Name: DeviceID
Feature.Description::en: Device identifier (serial number).
Feature.Description::cn: 设备标识符（序列号）

Feature.Name: DeviceLinkConnectionCount
Feature.Description::en: Returns the number of physical connection of the device used by a particular Link.
Feature.Description::cn: 返回特定链接使用的设备的物理连接数

Feature.Name: DeviceLinkHeartbeatMode
Feature.Description::en: Activate or deactivate the Link`s heartbeat.
Feature.Description::cn: 激活或停用链接的心跳

Feature.Name: DeviceLinkHeartbeatTimeout
Feature.Description::en: Controls the current heartbeat timeout of the specific Link.
Feature.Description::cn: 控制特定链接的当前心跳超时

Feature.Name: DeviceLinkSelector
Feature.Description::en: Selects which Link of the device to control.
Feature.Description::cn: 选择要控制的设备链接

Feature.Name: DeviceLinkSpeed
Feature.Description::en: Indicates the speed of transmission negotiated on the specified Link.
Feature.Description::cn: 指示在指定链路上协商的传输速度

Feature.Name: DeviceLinkThroughputLimit
Feature.Description::en: Limits the maximum bandwidth of the data that will be streamed out by the device on the selected Link. If necessary, delays will be uniformly inserted between transport layer packets in order to control the peak bandwidth.
Feature.Description::cn: 限制在选定链路上由设备流出的数据的最大带宽。如有必要，在传输层分组之间均匀地插入延迟以控制峰值带宽

Feature.Name: DeviceLinkThroughputLimitMode
Feature.Description::en: Controls if the DeviceLinkThroughputLimit is active. When disabled, lower level TL specific features are expected to control the throughput. When enabled, DeviceLinkThroughputLimit controls the overall throughput.
Feature.DisplayName::cn: 设备链路吞吐量限制模式
Feature.Description::cn: 控制设备链路吞吐量限制是否处于活动状态。禁用时，较低级别的TL特定功能将控制吞吐量。启用时，设备链路吞吐量限制控制总吞吐量

Feature.Name: DeviceManufacturerInfo
Feature.Description::en: Manufacturer information about the device.
Feature.Description::cn: 有关设备的制造商信息

Feature.Name: DeviceMaxThroughput
Feature.Description::en: Indicates max data in bits from the camera each second.
Feature.Description::cn: 指示每秒来自相机的最大数据（位）

Feature.Name: DeviceModelName
Feature.Description::en: Model name of the device.
Feature.Description::cn: 设备的型号名称

Feature.Name: DeviceReset
Feature.Description::en: Resets the device to its initial state and default settings.
Feature.Description::cn: 将设备重置为其初始状态和默认设置

Feature.Name: DeviceScanType
Feature.Description::en: Scan type of the sensor.
Feature.Description::cn: 传感器的扫描类型

Feature.Name: DeviceSerialNumber
Feature.Description::en: Device`s serial number. This string is a unique identifier of the device.
Feature.Description::cn: 设备序列号。此字符串是设备的唯一标识符

Feature.Name: DeviceStreamChannelCount
Feature.Description::en: Indicates the number of streaming channels supported by the device.
Feature.Description::cn: 指示设备支持的流通道数

Feature.Name: DeviceStreamChannelEndianness
Feature.Description::en: Endianess of multi-byte pixel data for this stream.
Feature.Description::cn: 此流的多字节像素数据的字节次序

Feature.Name: DeviceStreamChannelLink
Feature.Description::en: Index of device`s Link to use for streaming the specifed stream channel.
Feature.Description::cn: 用于流式传输指定流通道的设备链接的索引

Feature.Name: DeviceStreamChannelPacketSize
Feature.Description::en: Specifies the stream packet size, in bytes, to send on the selected channel for a Transmitter or specifies the maximum packet size supported by a receiver.
Feature.DisplayName::cn: 设备流通道数据包大小（B）
Feature.Description::cn: 指定要在所选通道上为发送器发送的流数据包大小（字节），或指定接收器所支持的最大数据包大小

Feature.Name: DeviceStreamChannelSelector
Feature.Description::en: Selects the stream channel to control.
Feature.Description::cn: 选择要控制的流通道

Feature.Name: DeviceStreamChannelType
Feature.Description::en: Reports the type of the stream channel.
Feature.Description::cn: 报告流通道的类型

Feature.Name: DeviceTemperature
Feature.Description::en: Device temperature in degrees Celcius (C).
Feature.Description::cn: 设备温度（摄氏度）

Feature.Name: DeviceTemperatureSelector
Feature.Description::en: Selects the location within the device, where the temperature will be measured.
Feature.Description::cn: 选择设备内测量温度的位置

Feature.Name: DeviceType
Feature.Description::en: Returns the device type.
Feature.Description::cn: 返回设备类型

Feature.Name: DeviceUptime
Feature.Description::en: Time of Device boot.
Feature.Description::cn: 设备启动时间

Feature.Name: DeviceUserID
Feature.Description::en: User Defined Name.
Feature.Description::cn: 用户定义的名称

Feature.Name: DeviceVendorName
Feature.Description::en: Name of the manufacturer of the device.
Feature.Description::cn: 设备制造商的名称

Feature.Name: DeviceVersion
Feature.Description::en: Version of the device.
Feature.Description::cn: 设备版本

Feature.Name: DigitalIOControl
Feature.Description::en: Category that contains the digital input and output control features.
Feature.Description::cn: 数字输入和输出控制功能类

Feature.Name: DigitalNoiseReductionMode
Feature.Description::en: This enumeration selects the mode of digital noise reduction.
Feature.Description::cn: 此枚举选择数字降噪模式

Feature.Name: DigitalShift
Feature.Description::en: This value sets the selected digital shift control
Feature.Description::cn: 此值设置选定的数字移位控制

Feature.Name: DigitalShiftEnable
Feature.Description::en: Enables/disables DigitalShift adjustment.
Feature.Description::cn: 使能/禁用数字移位调节

Feature.Name: EncoderControl
Feature.Description::en: Category that contains the Encoder Control features.
Feature.Description::cn: 编码器控制功能类

Feature.Name: EncoderCounter
Feature.Description::en: This integer value (read only) indicates the current value of the tick counter of the shaft encoder module.
Feature.Description::cn: 此整数值（只读）表示轴编码器模块刻度计数器的当前值

Feature.Name: EncoderCounterMax
Feature.Description::en: This integer value sets the maximum value for the tick counter of the shaft encoder module.
Feature.Description::cn: 该整数值设置轴编码器模块的刻度计数器的最大值

Feature.Name: EncoderCounterMode
Feature.Description::en: Selects the counting mode of the tick counter of the shaft encoder module.
Feature.Description::cn: 选择轴编码器模块刻度计数器的计数模式

Feature.Name: EncoderCounterReset
Feature.Description::en: This command resets the tick counter count of the shaft encoder module to 0.
Feature.Description::cn: 此命令将轴编码器模块的刻度计数器计数重置为0

Feature.Name: EncoderMaxReverseCounter
Feature.Description::en: This integer value sets the maximum value for the reverse counter of the shaft encoder module.
Feature.DisplayName::cn: 编码器最大反向计数器
Feature.Description::cn: 此整数值设置轴编码器模块的反向计数器的最大值

Feature.Name: EncoderOutputMode
Feature.Description::en: This enumeration value selects the circumstances for the shaft encoder module to output trigger signals.
Feature.Description::cn: 此枚举值选择轴编码器模块输出触发信号的情况

Feature.Name: EncoderReverseCounterReset
Feature.Description::en: This command resets the reverse counter of the shaft encoder module to 0 and informs the module that the current direction of conveyor movement is forward. Reset must be carried out before the first conveyor movement in the forward direction.
Feature.DisplayName::cn: 编码器反向计数器复位
Feature.Description::cn: 此命令将轴编码器模块的反向计数器重置为0，并通知模块当前的传送带移动方向为前进。必须在第一个输送机向前移动之前进行复位

Feature.Name: EncoderSelector
Feature.Description::en: Selects which Encoder to configure.
Feature.Description::cn: 选择要配置的编码器

Feature.Name: EncoderSourceA
Feature.Description::en: Selects the input line as signal source for the shaft encoder module.
Feature.Description::cn: 选择输入线作为轴编码器模块的信号源

Feature.Name: EncoderSourceB
Feature.Description::en: Selects the input line as signal source for the shaft encoder module.
Feature.Description::cn: 选择输入线作为轴编码器模块的信号源

Feature.Name: ExposureAuto
Feature.Description::en: Sets the automatic exposure mode when Exposure Mode is Timed.
Feature.Description::cn: 设置定时曝光模式时的自动曝光模式

Feature.Name: ExposureMode
Feature.Description::en: Sets the operation mode of the Exposure (or shutter).
Feature.Description::cn: 设置曝光（或快门）的工作模式

Feature.Name: ExposureTime
Feature.Description::en: Exposure time in us when Exposure Mode is Timed.
Feature.Description::cn: 曝光模式定时时的曝光时间

Feature.Name: ExposureTimeMode
Feature.Description::en: Sets the ExposureTime mode of the Exposure (or shutter).
Feature.Description::cn: 设置曝光（或快门）的曝光时间模式

Feature.Name: FPNCEnable
Feature.DisplayName::cn: 固定模式噪声矫正使能

Feature.Name: FanOpenThreshold
Feature.Description::en: Sets the Threshold of fan's switch.
Feature.Description::cn: 设置风扇开关的阈值

Feature.Name: FileAccessControl
Feature.Description::en: Category that contains the File Access control features.
Feature.Description::cn: 文件访问控制功能类

Feature.Name: FileAccessLength
Feature.Description::en: Controls the length of the mapping between the device file storage and the FileAccessBuffer.
Feature.Description::cn: 控制设备文件存储和文件访问缓存之间映射的长度

Feature.Name: FileAccessOffset
Feature.Description::en: Controls the Offset of the mapping between the device file storage and the FileAccessBuffer.
Feature.Description::cn: 控制设备文件存储和文件访问缓存之间映射的偏移量

Feature.Name: FileOpenMode
Feature.Description::en: Selects the access mode in which a file is opened in the device.
Feature.Description::cn: 选择在设备中打开文件的访问模式

Feature.Name: FileOperationExecute
Feature.Description::en: Executes the operation selected by FileOperationSelector on the selected file.
Feature.Description::cn: 在所选文件上执行文件操作选择器选择的操作

Feature.Name: FileOperationResult
Feature.Description::en: Represents the file operation result.
Feature.Description::cn: 表示文件操作结果

Feature.Name: FileOperationSelector
Feature.Description::en: Selects the target operation for the selected file in the device.
Feature.Description::cn: 选择设备中选定文件的目标操作

Feature.Name: FileOperationStatus
Feature.Description::en: Represents the file operation execution status.
Feature.Description::cn: 表示文件操作执行状态

Feature.Name: FileSelector
Feature.Description::en: Selects the target file in the device.
Feature.Description::cn: 选择设备中的目标文件

Feature.Name: FileSize
Feature.Description::en: Represents the size of the selected file in bytes.
Feature.Description::cn: 表示选定文件的大小（字节）

Feature.Name: FindMe
Feature.Description::en: Find current device.
Feature.Description::cn: 查找当前设备

Feature.Name: FrameSpecInfo
Feature.Description::en: the frame-specific information.
Feature.Description::cn: 特定于帧的信息

Feature.Name: FrameSpecInfoSelector
Feature.Description::en: Selects the frame-specific information.
Feature.DisplayName::cn: 嵌入式图像信息选择器
Feature.Description::cn: 选择特定于帧的信息

Feature.Name: FrameTimeoutEnable
Feature.Description::en: Enables the Frame Timeout.
Feature.Description::cn: 使能帧超时

Feature.Name: FrameTimeoutTime
Feature.Description::en: Sets the frame timeout in microseconds. When the timeout expires before a frame acquisition is complete, a partial frame will be delivered.
Feature.Description::cn: 以微秒为单位设置帧超时。当超时在帧获取完成之前过期时，将传递部分帧

Feature.Name: FrequencyConverterControl
Feature.Description::en: Category that contains the Frequency Converter features.
Feature.Description::cn: 变频器功能类

Feature.Name: Gain
Feature.Description::en: Gain applied to the image in dB.
Feature.Description::cn: 应用于图像的增益，单位为dB

Feature.Name: GainAuto
Feature.Description::en: Sets the automatic gain control (AGC) mode.
Feature.Description::cn: 设置自动增益控制（AGC）模式

Feature.Name: GainShutPrior
Feature.Description::en: Sets the priority of the Exposure and Gain.
Feature.Description::cn: 设置曝光和增益的优先级

Feature.Name: Gamma
Feature.Description::en: Controls the gamma correction of pixel intensity.
Feature.Description::cn: 控制像素强度的伽马校正

Feature.Name: GammaEnable
Feature.Description::en: Enables/disables gamma correction.
Feature.Description::cn: 使能/禁用伽马校正

Feature.Name: GammaSelector
Feature.Description::en: This enumeration selects the type of gamma to apply.
Feature.Description::cn: 此枚举选择要应用的伽马类型

Feature.Name: GevCCP
Feature.Description::en: Controls the device access privilege of an application.
Feature.Description::cn: 控制应用程序的设备访问权限

Feature.Name: GevCurrentDefaultGateway
Feature.Description::en: Indicates the default gateway IP address to be used on the given network interface.
Feature.Description::cn: 指示要在给定网络接口上使用的默认网关IP地址

Feature.Name: GevCurrentIPAddress
Feature.Description::en: Current IP address for the given network interface.
Feature.Description::cn: 给定网络接口的当前IP地址

Feature.Name: GevCurrentIPConfigurationDHCP
Feature.Description::en: Indicates if DHCP IP configuration scheme is activated on the given network interface.
Feature.Description::cn: 指示是否在给定的网络接口上激活动态主机配置协议IP配置方案

Feature.Name: GevCurrentIPConfigurationLLA
Feature.Description::en: Indicates if Link Local Address IP configuration scheme is activated on the given network interface.
Feature.Description::cn: 指示是否在给定的网络接口上激活链路本地地址IP配置方案

Feature.Name: GevCurrentIPConfigurationPersistentIP
Feature.DisplayName::en: GEV Current IP Configuration Persistent IP
Feature.Description::en: Indicates if Persistent IP configuration scheme is activated on the given network interface.
Feature.Description::cn: 指示是否在给定的网络接口上激活静态IP配置方案

Feature.Name: GevCurrentSubnetMask
Feature.Description::en: Current subnet mask of the given interface.
Feature.Description::cn: 给定接口的当前子网掩码

Feature.Name: GevDeviceModeCharacterSet
Feature.Description::en: Character set used by all the strings of the bootstrap registers.
Feature.Description::cn: 引导寄存器的所有字符串使用的字符集

Feature.Name: GevDeviceModeIsBigEndian
Feature.DisplayName::en: GEV Device Mode Is Big Endian
Feature.Description::en: Endianess of the device registers.
Feature.Description::cn: 设备寄存器的字节次序

Feature.Name: GevFirstURL
Feature.Description::en: The first choice of URL for the XML device description file.
Feature.Description::cn: XML设备描述文件的首选URL

Feature.Name: GevGVCPHeartbeatDisable
Feature.Description::en: Disables the GVCP heartbeat.
Feature.Description::cn: 禁用GVCP心跳

Feature.Name: GevGVCPPendingAck
Feature.Description::en: Enables generation of PENDING_ACK.
Feature.Description::cn: 使能PENDING_ACK生成

Feature.Name: GevGVCPPendingTimeout
Feature.Description::en: Indicates the longest GVCP command execution time before a device returns a PENDING_ACK.
Feature.Description::cn: 指示设备返回PENDING_ACK之前的最长GVCP命令执行时间

Feature.Name: GevGVSPExtendedIDMode
Feature.Description::en: Enables the extended IDs mode.
Feature.Description::cn: 启用扩展标识模式

Feature.Name: GevHeartbeatTimeout
Feature.Description::en: Indicates the current heartbeat timeout in milliseconds.
Feature.Description::cn: 指示当前心跳超时（毫秒）

Feature.Name: GevIEEE1588
Feature.Description::en: Enables the IEEE 1588 Precision Time Protocol to control the timestamp register.
Feature.Description::cn: 使能IEEE1588精确时间协议控制时间戳寄存器

Feature.Name: GevIEEE1588Status
Feature.Description::en: Provides the status of the IEEE 1588 clock.
Feature.Description::cn: 提供IEEE1588时钟的状态

Feature.Name: GevInterfaceSelector
Feature.Description::en: Selects which physical network interface to control.
Feature.Description::cn: 选择要控制的物理网络接口

Feature.Name: GevLinkSpeed
Feature.Description::en: Indicates the speed of transmission negotiated by the given network interface in Mbps.
Feature.Description::cn: 指示给定网络接口协商的传输速度（以Mbps为单位）

Feature.Name: GevMACAddress
Feature.Description::en: MAC address of the network interface.
Feature.Description::cn: 网络接口的MAC地址

Feature.Name: GevMCDA
Feature.Description::en: Controls the destination IP address for the message channel.
Feature.Description::cn: 控制消息通道的目标IP地址

Feature.Name: GevMCPHostPort
Feature.Description::en: Controls the port to which the device must send messages. Setting this value to 0 closes the message channel.
Feature.Description::cn: 控制设备必须向其发送消息的端口。将此值设置为0将关闭消息通道

Feature.Name: GevMCRC
Feature.Description::en: Controls the number of retransmissions allowed when a message channel message times out.
Feature.Description::cn: 控制消息通道消息超时时允许的重传次数

Feature.Name: GevMCSP
Feature.Description::en: This feature indicates the source port for the message channel.
Feature.Description::cn: 此功能指示消息通道的源端口

Feature.Name: GevMCTT
Feature.Description::en: Provides the transmission timeout value in milliseconds.
Feature.Description::cn: 提供以毫秒为单位的传输超时值

Feature.Name: GevMessageChannelCount
Feature.Description::en: Indicates the number of message channels supported by this device.
Feature.Description::cn: 指示此设备支持的消息通道数

Feature.Name: GevNumberOfInterfaces
Feature.Description::en: Indicates the number of physical network interfaces supported by this device.
Feature.Description::cn: 指示此设备支持的物理网络接口数

Feature.Name: GevPAUSEFrameReception
Feature.Description::en: Controls whether incoming PAUSE Frames are handled on the given logical link.
Feature.Description::cn: 控制是否在给定的逻辑链接上处理传入的暂停帧

Feature.Name: GevPersistentDefaultGateway
Feature.Description::en: Indicates the persistent default gateway for this network interface. It is only used when the device boots with the Persistent IP configuration scheme.
Feature.Description::cn: 指示此网络接口的静态默认网关。仅当设备使用静态IP配置方案启动时才使用

Feature.Name: GevPersistentIPAddress
Feature.Description::en: Indicates the persistent IP address for this network interface. It is only used when the device boots with the Persistent IP configuration scheme.
Feature.Description::cn: 指示此网络接口的静态IP地址。仅当设备使用静态IP配置方案启动时才使用

Feature.Name: GevPersistentSubnetMask
Feature.Description::en: Indicates the persistent subnet mask associated with the persistent IP address on this network interface. It is only used when the device boots with the Persistent IP configuration scheme.
Feature.Description::cn: 指示与此网络接口上的静态IP地址关联的静态子网掩码。仅当设备使用静态IP配置方案启动时才使用

Feature.Name: GevSCDA
Feature.Description::en: Indicates the destination IP address for this stream channel.
Feature.Description::cn: 指示此流通道的目标IP地址

Feature.Name: GevSCPD
Feature.Description::en: Indicates the delay (in timestamp counter units) to insert between each packet for this stream channel. This can be used as a crude flow-control mechanism if the application or the network infrastructure cannot keep up with the packets coming from the device.
Feature.Description::cn: 指示要在此流通道的每个数据包之间插入的延迟（以时间戳计数器为单位）。如果应用程序或网络基础设施无法跟上来自设备的数据包，则可以将其用作粗糙的流控制机制

Feature.Name: GevSCPDirection
Feature.Description::en: Transmit or Receive of the channel
Feature.Description::cn: 通道的发送或接收

Feature.Name: GevSCPHostPort
Feature.Description::en: Host port of the channel
Feature.Description::cn: 通道的主机端口

Feature.Name: GevSCPInterfaceIndex
Feature.Description::en: Index of network interface to use.
Feature.Description::cn: 要使用的网络接口的索引

Feature.Name: GevSCPSBigEndian
Feature.Description::en: Endianess of multi-byte pixel data for this stream.
Feature.Description::cn: 此流的多字节像素数据的字节次序

Feature.Name: GevSCPSDoNotFragment
Feature.Description::en: The state of this feature is copied into the "do not fragment" bit of the IP header of each stream packet.
Feature.Description::cn: 此功能的状态被复制到每个流数据包的IP头的“不分段”位中

Feature.Name: GevSCPSFireTestPacket
Feature.Description::en: Sends a test packet.
Feature.Description::cn: 发送测试数据包

Feature.Name: GevSCPSPacketSize
Feature.Description::en: Specifies the stream packet size (in bytes) to send on this channel.
Feature.Description::cn: 指定要在此通道上发送的流数据包大小（字节）

Feature.Name: GevSCSP
Feature.Description::en: Indicates the source UDP port address for this stream channel.
Feature.Description::cn: 指示此流通道的源UDP端口地址

Feature.Name: GevSecondURL
Feature.Description::en: The second choice of URL to the XML device description file.
Feature.Description::cn: XML设备描述文件URL的第二种选择

Feature.Name: GevStreamChannelCount
Feature.Description::en: Indicates the number of stream channels supported by this device.
Feature.Description::cn: 指示此设备支持的流通道数

Feature.Name: GevStreamChannelSelector
Feature.Description::en: Selects the stream channel to control.
Feature.Description::cn: 选择要控制的流通道

Feature.Name: GevSupportedOption
Feature.Description::en: Indicates whether or not the selected GEV option is supported.
Feature.Description::cn: 指示是否支持选定的GEV选项

Feature.Name: GevSupportedOptionSelector
Feature.Description::en: Selects the GEV option to interrogate for existing support.
Feature.Description::cn: 选择GEV选项询问现有的支持

Feature.Name: GevTimestampControlLatch
Feature.Description::en: This command latches the current timestamp value of the device.
Feature.Description::cn: 此命令锁定设备的当前时间戳值

Feature.Name: GevTimestampControlLatchReset
Feature.Description::en: This command resets the timestamp control latch.
Feature.Description::cn: 此命令重置时间戳控制锁存

Feature.Name: GevTimestampControlReset
Feature.Description::en: This command resets the timestamp value for the device
Feature.Description::cn: 此命令重置设备的时间戳值

Feature.Name: GevTimestampTickFrequency
Feature.Description::en: Indicates the number of timestamp ticks in 1 second (frequency in Hz).
Feature.Description::cn: 指示1秒内的时间戳刻度数（频率单位为Hz）

Feature.Name: GevTimestampValue
Feature.Description::en: This is a read only element. It indicates the latched value of the timestamp. (The timestamp must first be latched using the Timestamp Control Latch command.)
Feature.Description::cn: 这是一个只读元素。它指示时间戳的锁存值（必须首先使用时间戳控制锁存命令锁存时间戳）

Feature.Name: GevVersionMajor
Feature.Description::en: Major version of the specification.
Feature.Description::cn: 规范的主要版本

Feature.Name: GevVersionMinor
Feature.Description::en: Minor version of the specification.
Feature.Description::cn: 规范的次要版本

Feature.Name: HardwareTriggerActivation
Feature.Description::en: Specifies the activation mode of the Hardware trigger.
Feature.Description::cn: 指定硬件触发器的激活模式

Feature.Name: HardwareTriggerSource
Feature.Description::en: Selects which hardware trigger source.
Feature.Description::cn: 选择哪个硬件触发源

Feature.Name: Height
Feature.Description::en: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels).
Feature.Description::cn: 设备提供的图像的高度（像素）

Feature.Name: HeightMax
Feature.Description::en: Maximum height of the image (in pixels).
Feature.Description::cn: 图像的最大高度（以像素为单位）

Feature.Name: Hue
Feature.Description::en: Hue of the image in degrees.
Feature.Description::cn: 图像的色调（度）

Feature.Name: HueAuto
Feature.Description::en: Controls the mode for automatic hue level adjustment. The exact algorithm used to implement this adjustment is device-specific.
Feature.Description::cn: 控制自动色调级别调节模式。用于实现此调整的精确算法是特定于设备的

Feature.Name: HueEnable
Feature.Description::en: Enables/disables hue adjustment.
Feature.Description::cn: 使能/禁用色调调整

Feature.Name: ImageCompressionMode
Feature.Description::en: Enable a specific image compression mode as the base mode for image transfer.
Feature.Description::cn: 启用特定的图像压缩模式作为图像传输的基本模式

Feature.Name: ImageCompressionQuality
Feature.Description::en: Control the quality of the produced compressed stream.
Feature.Description::cn: 控制压缩流的质量

Feature.Name: ImageFormatControl
Feature.Description::en: Category for image format control features.
Feature.Description::cn: 图像格式控制功能类

Feature.Name: InputSource
Feature.Description::en: Selects the input source.
Feature.Description::cn: 选择输入源

Feature.Name: LSCCRCEnable
Feature.Description::en: Enable the LSC Control
Feature.Description::cn: 使能镜头阴影矫正控制

Feature.Name: LSCSTATEnable
Feature.Description::en: Statistics generate LSC coefficients.
Feature.Description::cn: 统计数据生成镜头阴影矫正系数

Feature.Name: LUTControl
Feature.Description::en: Category that includes the LUT control features.
Feature.Description::cn: 显示查找表控制功能类

Feature.Name: LUTEnable
Feature.Description::en: Activates the selected LUT.
Feature.Description::cn: 激活选定的显示查找表

Feature.Name: LUTIndex
Feature.Description::en: Control the index (offset) of the coefficient to access in the selected LUT.
Feature.Description::cn: 控制要在选定显示查找表中访问的系数的索引（偏移）

Feature.Name: LUTSelector
Feature.Description::en: Selects which LUT to control.
Feature.Description::cn: 选择要控制的显示查找表

Feature.Name: LUTValue
Feature.Description::en: Returns the Value at entry LUTIndex of the LUT selected by LUTSelector.
Feature.Description::cn: 返回由显示查找表选择器选择的显示查找表的显示查找表索引处的值

Feature.Name: LineCounter
Feature.Description::en: Indicates the count of image lines.
Feature.Description::cn: 指示图像行的计数

Feature.Name: LineDebouncerTime
Feature.Description::en: Sets the value of the selected line debouncer time in us.
Feature.Description::cn: 设置所选行去缓冲时间的值（us）

Feature.Name: LineInverter
Feature.Description::en: Controls the inversion of the signal of the selected input or output line.
Feature.Description::cn: 控制所选输入或输出线的信号反转

Feature.Name: LineMode
Feature.Description::en: Controls whether the physical Line is used to Input or Output a signal.
Feature.Description::cn: 控制物理线路是用于输入还是输出信号

Feature.Name: LinePitch
Feature.Description::en: Total number of bytes between 2 successive lines. This feature is used to facilitate alignment of image data.
Feature.Description::cn: 两个连续行之间的字节总数。此功能用于促进图像数据的对齐

Feature.Name: LineSelector
Feature.Description::en: Selects the physical line (or pin) of the external device connector to configure.
Feature.Description::cn: 选择要配置的外部设备连接器的物理线（或管脚）

Feature.Name: LineSource
Feature.Description::en: Selects which internal acquisition or I/O source signal to output on the selected line.
Feature.Description::cn: 选择要在选定线路上输出的内部采集或I/O源信号

Feature.Name: LineStatus
Feature.Description::en: Returns the current status of the selected input or output Line.
Feature.Description::cn: 返回所选输入或输出线路的当前状态

Feature.Name: LineStatusAll
Feature.Description::en: Returns the current status of all available Line signals at time of polling in a single bitfield.
Feature.Description::cn: 返回在单个位字段中进行轮询时所有可用线路信号的当前状态

Feature.Name: LineTriggerSoftware
Feature.Description::en: Generates an internal trigger if Line Source is set to SoftwareTrigger Or Timer.
Feature.Description::cn: 如果行源设置为软触发或定时器，则生成内部触发器

Feature.Name: Multiplier
Feature.Description::en: Sets the multiplier value for the multiplier sub-module.
Feature.Description::cn: 设置乘法器子模块的乘法器值

Feature.Name: NUCEnable
Feature.Description::en: Enable the FPNC and PRNUC Control
Feature.Description::cn: 启用固定模式噪声矫正和光响应不一致性矫正控制

Feature.Name: NoiseReduction
Feature.Description::en: Sets the noise reduction level.
Feature.Description::cn: 设置降噪级别

Feature.Name: OffsetX
Feature.Description::en: Vertical offset from the origin to the AOI (in pixels).
Feature.Description::cn: 从原点到AOI的垂直偏移（像素）

Feature.Name: OffsetY
Feature.Description::en: Horizontal offset from the origin to the AOI (in pixels).
Feature.Description::cn: 从原点到AOI的水平偏移（像素）

Feature.Name: PRNUCEnable
Feature.DisplayName::cn: 光响应不一致性矫正使能

Feature.Name: PacketUnorderSupport
Feature.Description::en: Is Support Packet out of order.
Feature.Description::cn: 支持数据包是否乱序

Feature.Name: PartialFrameDiscard
Feature.Description::en: Discard the partial frame.
Feature.Description::cn: 抛弃局部帧

Feature.Name: PayloadSize
Feature.Description::en: Number of bytes transferred for each image or chunk on the stream channel.
Feature.Description::cn: 为流通道上的每个图像或数据块传输的字节数

Feature.Name: PixelDynamicRangeMax
Feature.Description::en: Indicates the maximum pixel value transferred from the camera.
Feature.Description::cn: 指示从相机传送的最大像素值

Feature.Name: PixelDynamicRangeMin
Feature.Description::en: Indicates the minimum pixel value transferred from the camera.
Feature.Description::cn: 指示从相机传输的最小像素值

Feature.Name: PixelFormat
Feature.Description::en: Format of the pixel data.
Feature.Description::cn: 像素数据的格式

Feature.Name: PixelSize
Feature.Description::en: Size of a pixel in bits.
Feature.Description::cn: 像素的大小（以位为单位）

Feature.Name: PostDivider
Feature.Description::en: Sets the PostDivider value for the PostDivider sub-module.
Feature.Description::cn: 设置后分频器子模块的后分频器值

Feature.Name: PreDivider
Feature.Description::en: Sets the pre-divider value for the pre-divider sub-module.
Feature.Description::cn: 设置预分频器子模块的预分频器值

Feature.Name: PreampGain
Feature.Description::en: Sets the automatic gain control (AGC) mode.
Feature.Description::cn: 设置自动增益控制（AGC）模式

Feature.Name: PreventOvertrigger
Feature.Description::en: Enables overtriggering protection.
Feature.Description::cn: 使能过触发保护

Feature.Name: RegionDestination
Feature.Description::en: Control the destination of the selected region.
Feature.Description::cn: 控制选定区域的目标

Feature.Name: RegionMode
Feature.Description::en: Controls if the selected Region of interest is active and streaming.
Feature.Description::cn: 控制所选感兴趣区域是否处于活动状态并进行流处理

Feature.Name: RegionSelector
Feature.Description::en: Selects the Region of interest to control. The RegionSelector feature allows devices that are able to extract multiple regions out of an image, to configure the features of those individual regions independently.
Feature.Description::cn: 选择要控制的感兴趣区域。区域功能允许能够从图像中提取多个区域的设备独立配置这些单独区域的功能

Feature.Name: ResultingFrameRate
Feature.Description::en: Indicates the 'absolute' value of the maximum allowed acquisition frame rate. The 'absolute' value is a float value that indicates the maximum allowed acquisition frame rate in frames per second given the current settings for the area of interest, exposure time, and bandwidth.
Feature.Description::cn: 指示允许的最大采集帧速率的“绝对”值。“绝对值”是一个浮点值，它指示在感兴趣区域、曝光时间和带宽的当前设置下每秒帧数中允许的最大采集帧速率

Feature.Name: ResultingLineRate
Feature.Description::en: Indicates the 'absolute' value of the maximum allowed acquisition Line rate. The 'absolute' value is a float value that indicates the maximum allowed acquisition Line rate in Lines per second given the current settings for the area of interest, exposure time, and bandwidth.
Feature.Description::cn: 表示最大允许采集行频的“绝对值”。“绝对值”是一个浮点值，它指示在感兴趣区域、曝光时间和带宽的当前设置下每秒行中允许的最大采集行频

Feature.Name: ReverseScanDirection
Feature.Description::en: select scan direction reverse or not.
Feature.Description::cn: 选择扫描方向是否反转

Feature.Name: ReverseX
Feature.Description::en: Flip horizontally the image sent by the device. The AOI is applied after the flip.
Feature.Description::cn: 水平翻转设备发送的图像。翻转后应用感兴趣区域

Feature.Name: ReverseY
Feature.Description::en: Flip vertically the image sent by the device. The Region of interest is applied after the flipping.
Feature.Description::cn: 垂直翻转设备发送的图像。翻转后应用感兴趣区域

Feature.Name: Saturation
Feature.Description::en: Saturation of the image in percent.
Feature.Description::cn: 图像的饱和度百分比

Feature.Name: SaturationAuto
Feature.Description::en: Controls the mode for automatic saturation adjustment.
Feature.Description::cn: 控制自动饱和调节模式

Feature.Name: SaturationEnable
Feature.Description::en: Enables/disables saturation adjustment.
Feature.Description::cn: 使能/禁用饱和度调节

Feature.Name: ScanStart
Feature.Description::en: Starts the Frame Trigger of the device.
Feature.Description::cn: 启动设备的帧触发器

Feature.Name: ScanStop
Feature.Description::en: Stops Frame Trigger of the device.
Feature.Description::cn: 停止设备的帧触发器

Feature.Name: SelectBitRegion
Feature.Description::en: Selects the Sensor Bit Region of interest. Selects 8-Bits Region from 12 Bits Sensor Region.
Feature.Description::cn: 选择感兴趣的传感器位区域。从12位传感器区域中选择8位区域

Feature.Name: SensorDigitizationTaps
Feature.Description::en: Number of digitized samples outputted simultaneously by the camera A/D conversion stage.
Feature.Description::cn: 相机模数转换级同时输出的数字化样本数

Feature.Name: SensorMode
Feature.Description::en: Sets the Photographic mode of sensor
Feature.Description::cn: 设置传感器的拍照模式

Feature.Name: SensorShutterMode
Feature.Description::en: Sets the operation mode of the sensor's shutter
Feature.Description::cn: 设置传感器快门的工作模式

Feature.Name: SensorTaps
Feature.Description::en: Number of taps of the camera sensor.
Feature.Description::cn: 相机传感器的通道数

Feature.Name: SerialPortBaudrate
Feature.Description::en: Serial Port Baudrate of Device.
Feature.Description::cn: 设备的串行端口波特率

Feature.Name: ShadingCorrection
Feature.Description::en: Includes items used to control the operation of the camera's shading correction.
Feature.Description::cn: 阴影校正控制功能类

Feature.Name: ShadingSelector
Feature.Description::en: Selects the kind of shading correction.
Feature.Description::cn: 选择阴影校正的类型

Feature.Name: Sharpness
Feature.Description::en: Sharpness of the image.
Feature.Description::cn: 图像的锐度

Feature.Name: SharpnessAuto
Feature.Description::en: Controls the mode for automatic sharpness adjustment.
Feature.Description::cn: 控制自动锐度调节的模式

Feature.Name: SharpnessEnable
Feature.Description::en: Enables/disables sharpness adjustment.
Feature.Description::cn: 使能/禁用锐度调节

Feature.Name: SignalAlignment
Feature.Description::en: Selects the signal transition relationships between received and generated signals.
Feature.Description::cn: 选择接收信号和生成信号之间的信号转换关系

Feature.Name: StrobeEnable
Feature.Description::en: Enables the strobe signal to be output to the selected line.
Feature.Description::cn: 使能输出信号输出到所选线路

Feature.Name: StrobeLineDelay
Feature.Description::en: Sets the value of the selected Strobe Line Delay in us.
Feature.Description::cn: 以us为单位设置选定输出线路延迟的值

Feature.Name: StrobeLineDuration
Feature.Description::en: Sets the value of the selected Strobe Line Duration in us.
Feature.Description::cn: 以us为单位设置选定输出线路持续时间的值

Feature.Name: StrobeLinePreDelay
Feature.Description::en: Sets the value of the selected Strobe Line PreDelay in us.
Feature.Description::cn: 以us为单位设置选定输出线路预延迟的值

Feature.Name: TZCoef0
Feature.Description::en: TZCoef0.
Feature.Description::cn: 系数0

Feature.Name: TZCoef1
Feature.Description::en: TZCoef1.
Feature.Description::cn: 系数1

Feature.Name: TZCoef2
Feature.Description::en: TZCoef2.
Feature.Description::cn: 系数2

Feature.Name: TZDenoiseCoef
Feature.Description::en: TZDenoiseCoef.
Feature.Description::cn: 降噪系数

Feature.Name: TZDenoiseOpen
Feature.Description::en: TZDenoiseOpen.
Feature.Description::cn: 降噪开

Feature.Name: TZPureOpen
Feature.Description::en: TZPureOpen.
Feature.Description::cn: 纯净开

Feature.Name: TemporalNoiseReduction
Feature.Description::en: Sets the temporal noise reduction level.
Feature.Description::cn: 设置时域降噪级别

Feature.Name: TestPattern
Feature.Description::en: Selects the type of test pattern that is generated by the device as image source.
Feature.Description::cn: 选择设备生成的测试模式类型作为图像源

Feature.Name: TestPatternGeneratorSelector
Feature.Description::en: Selects which test pattern generator is controlled by the TestPattern feature.
Feature.DisplayName::cn: 测试模式生成器选择器
Feature.Description::cn: 选择由测试模式功能控制的测试模式生成器

Feature.Name: TransportLayerControl
Feature.Description::en: Category that contains the transport layer control features.
Feature.Description::cn: 传输层控制功能类

Feature.Name: TriggerActivation
Feature.Description::en: Specifies the activation mode of the trigger.
Feature.Description::cn: 指定触发器的激活模式

Feature.Name: TriggerCacheEnable
Feature.Description::en: Specifies whether or not the Trigger Cache is enabled.
Feature.Description::cn: 指定是否启用触发器缓存

Feature.Name: TriggerDelay
Feature.Description::en: Specifies the delay (in us) to apply after the trigger reception before activating it.
Feature.Description::cn: 指定在激活触发接收之前要应用的延迟（以us为单位）

Feature.Name: TriggerFallingDelay
Feature.Description::en: Specifies the falling delay (in us) to apply after the trigger reception before activating it.
Feature.Description::cn: 指定触发接收后激活前要应用的下降延迟（以us为单位）

Feature.Name: TriggerMode
Feature.Description::en: Controls whether or not the selected trigger is active.
Feature.Description::cn: 控制所选触发器是否处于活动状态

Feature.Name: TriggerPartialClose
Feature.Description::en: If True: transmit the portion of the frame acquired. If False transmit the complete frame acquired.
Feature.Description::cn: 如果为真：发送所获取帧的部分。如果错误，则发送所获取的完整帧

Feature.Name: TriggerRisingDelay
Feature.Description::en: Specifies the rising delay (in us) to apply after the trigger reception before activating it.
Feature.Description::cn: 指定在激活触发器之前，触发器接收后要应用的上升延迟（以us为单位）

Feature.Name: TriggerSelector
Feature.Description::en: Selects the type of trigger to configure.
Feature.Description::cn: 选择要配置的触发器类型

Feature.Name: TriggerSoftware
Feature.Description::en: Generates an internal trigger if Trigger Source is set to Software.
Feature.Description::cn: 如果触发器源设置为软件，则生成内部触发器

Feature.Name: TriggerSource
Feature.Description::en: Specifies the internal signal or physical input line to use as the trigger source. The selected trigger must have its TriggerMode set to On.
Feature.Description::cn: 指定用作触发源的内部信号或物理输入线路。所选触发器的触发模式必须设置为“开”。

Feature.Name: UserSetControl
Feature.Description::en: Category that contains the User Set control features.
Feature.Description::cn: 用户集控制功能类

Feature.Name: UserSetCurrent
Feature.Description::en: Indicates the user set that is currently in use. At initialization time, the camera loads the most recently saved user set.
Feature.Description::cn: 指示当前正在使用的用户集。在初始化时，相机加载最近保存的用户集

Feature.Name: UserSetDefault
Feature.Description::en: This enumeration sets the configuration set to be used as the default startup set. The configuration set that has been selected as the default startup set will be loaded as the active set whenever the camera is powered on or reset.
Feature.Description::cn: 此枚举设置要用作默认启动集的配置集。当相机开机或复位时，被选为默认启动集的配置集将被加载为活动集

Feature.Name: UserSetLoad
Feature.Description::en: This command loads the selected configuration set from the non-volatile memory in the camera to the volatile memory and makes the selected set the active configuration set. Once the selected set is loaded, the parameters in the selected set will control the camera.
Feature.Description::cn: 此命令将所选配置集从相机中的非易失性存储器加载到易失性存储器，并使所选配置集成为活动配置集。加载选定集后，选定集中的参数将控制相机

Feature.Name: UserSetSave
Feature.Description::en: This command copies the parameters in the current active configuration set into the selected user set in the camera's non-volatile memory.
Feature.Description::cn: 此命令将当前活动配置集中的参数复制到相机非易失性存储器中的选定用户集中

Feature.Name: UserSetSelector
Feature.Description::en: This enumeration selects the configuration set to load, save or configure. Possible values for the User Set Selector are: Default: Selects a configuration set that contains factory settings. User Set 1: Selects the first user set. When the Default configuration set is selected and loaded using User Set Load, the device must be in default factory settings state and must make sure the mandatory continuous acquisition use case works directly. Default User Set is read-only and cannot be modified.
Feature.Description::cn: 当使用用户设置加载选择并加载默认配置集时，设备必须处于默认出厂设置状态，并且必须确保强制连续采集用例直接工作。默认用户集是只读的，不能修改

Feature.Name: Width

Feature.Description::cn: 设备提供的图像宽度（像素）

Feature.Description::cn: 图像的最大宽度（以像素为单位）

Feature.Description::cn: 测试等待应答功能。在写入时，设备在确认写入之前等待一段时间的测试等待应答（ms）。打开读设备返回当前值，没有任何额外的等待时间

It helps especially when a camera is capable of operation in a non-standard configuration, and when the features PixelSize, SensorDigitizationTaps, and DeviceTapGeometry do not provide enough information for interpretation of the image data provided by the camera.
Feature.Description::cn: 此CameraLink特定功能描述了相机使用的配置。特别是当相机能够在非标准配置下运行，并且像素大小、传感器数字化通道和设备通道拓扑不能提供足够的信息来解释相机提供的图像数据时，它会很有帮助
